lead_paragraph: The Frenchman Gilles Simon reached his first career ATP final in the United States after a 6-3, 4-6, 6-4 victory against local favorite Sam Querrey at the Indianapolis Championships. Simon, a three-time winner on the Tour, will face the defending champion Dmitry Tursunov, who defeated James Blake, the top seed, 4-6, 6-3, 6-4.
